tool_description: Adjusts the priority level of support tickets based on business impact, customer tier, or escalation requirements.

ticket_id.description: Unique identifier for the support ticket

new_priority.description: New priority level: low, medium, high, critical

adjustment_reason.description: Reason for priority change: business_impact, customer_escalation, technical_complexity, management_directive

adjusted_by.description: ID of the agent making the priority adjustment

justification.description: Additional justification for the priority change

notify_team.description: Whether to notify the assigned team of the priority change

error_messages: Invalid ticket ID: The specified ticket does not exist in the system.
Invalid priority level: Use one of [low, medium, high, critical] for new_priority.
Invalid adjustment reason: Use one of [business_impact, customer_escalation, technical_complexity, management_directive].
Agent authorization failed: The specified agent does not have permission to adjust ticket priority.
Priority unchanged: The ticket already has the specified priority level.
usage: Provide ticket_id, new_priority, adjustment_reason, and adjusted_by to change ticket priority. Optionally include justification and set notify_team preferences.

priority_updated.description: Whether the priority was successfully updated

sla_impact.description: How the priority change affects SLA timelines
